comments: Professor Barten is such a wonderful art teacher. I came in not knowing how to draw, I couldn\'t even draw a symmetrical circle.. He is always positive and makes you feel good about your drawing! You can tell he loves what he does and always encourages you to keep up the good work. Be there everyday and show that you\'re trying.
He always encourages people. He is a very good teacher.
Great Teacher. Show up, do the work, and you\'ll get an A. Even if you can\'t draw, he\'ll do everything he can to help you become a better artist, sometimes even at his own expense.

He is a really nice charasmatic teacher, and is willing to make you better drawer. His class is really easy if you just do you work,and develop basic drawing skills(all black and white) he will always make you feel good about your art and gives good advise.he is really chill.

very nice and funny guy. come to class and do your work and homework and you will get a nice grade. he makes things very easy for you even if you are a beginning artist just experiment with what he shows you. recommended teacher for all students. also do not take marc he is very hard. my friend is a great artist and failed marc\'s class

Mr. Barten was a great teacher. He\'d help you through anything and everything and would always encourage you as an individual. He\'s rather nice but don\'t be fooled, you better work in this class to get an A--do all your homework and come to class as often as you can because a lot of your grade comes from in-class work.
